title: Scientists discover one of our universe's largest spinning structures — a 50-million-light-year-long cosmic thread
description: The discovery potentially transforms what we think about how the cosmic environment influences galaxies as they form.
content: The discovery potentially transforms what we think about how the cosmic environment influences galaxies as they form.
